# sshas

SSH config script

## Install

```
# optional
export PATH=$PATH:$HOME/.local/bin
```

```
python setup.py install --user
```

or

```
pip install sshas --user
```

## Usage

```
# Help
sshas -h

sshas list
sshas cb    # copy to clipboard before
sshas add   # add or modify config
sshas del
```
